column6: North}}</ref> died aged 180) was the twelfth king of [[Arthedain]].

column1: Arveleg came to throne upon the death of his father, [[Arvegil]], in {{TA
column2: 1743}}. He ruled for seventy years, apparently in an uneventful period as no noteworthy events are recorded during his reign.

column1: He died 180 years old and was succeeded by his son, [[Araval]].<ref name="North"/>
Arveleg's name is [[Sindarin]] for "Mighty King" from ''[[ar]]'' meaning "royal", and ''[[beleg]]'' (becoming [[Lenition
column2: lenited]] to ''veleg'') meaning "mighty, strong". It is likely, however, that he was simply named after his great-great-grandfather, [[Arveleg I]].

house=[[House of Isildur]]
Cadet branch of [[House of Elros]]
